title: (x) Ally Bank or Apex Fitness font: spurless lowercase a with a twist - probably custom
content:
Having trouble finding something similar to Ally Bank’s ‘a’ and/or the ‘ap’ in Apex Fittness logotypes.

[http://www.ally.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202023645/http:/www.ally.com/ "http://www.ally.com/")  
 [http://my.apexfitness.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202023645/http:/my.apexfitness.com/ "http://my.apexfitness.com/")
author: graphex

comments.content:
I think the ally 'a' is probably a modification of one of the Bauhaus-style fonts (Bauhaus, Pump, Blippo). See my [Bauhaus-style Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202023645/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/BauhausFaces.html) in case there may be a match that doesn't need modification.

- Mike Yanega
